articles.title: NASA Captures Eruption Of "Sharkcano", The Underwater Volcano Where Sharks Live - NDTV
articles.description: Kavachi volcano in the Solomon Islands, which is one of the most active submarine volcanoes in the Pacific Ocean and most known for its shark inhabitants, is showing increased plumes, as per the American space agency NASA.
articles.content:
Experts believe sharks must have mutated to survive in the acidic environment.

articles.title: Rain delays second half of Golden State Warriors-Dallas Mavericks game - ESPN
articles.description: Rain leaking through the roof of the American Airlines Center delayed the second half of Game 4 of the Western Conference finals by 16 minutes on Tuesday night.
articles.content: DALLAS -- Golden State's Splash Brothers were trying not to get wet at the start of the second half Tuesday night as water leaked through the roof of the American Airlines Center, delaying Game 4 of … [+1043 chars]
